alert.note: Alert for Blanco; Gillespie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 11:53AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Blanco and eastern Gillespie Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1153 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crabapple, or 8 miles north of Fredericksburg, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fredericksburg, Stonewall, Hye, Blumenthal, Eckert, Albert, Crabapple, Willow City, Rocky Hill, LBJ State Park and LBJ National Historical Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
